website_summaries.verdict: Experience the thrill of impactful Star Wars moments like the Battle of Hoth or the Battle of Scarif in this inexpensive package.
pros: Play as iconic characters like Luke Skywalker, Princess Leia, Bossk, and Greedo
Participate in huge battles between Rebels and the Empire
cons: The load times may feel too long to some players

customer_reviews.title: 12 year old son loves this game
customer_reviews.text: Great game for my son, 12 years old. However to play multiplayer he has to use my account due to his age. At 13 can play multiplayer on his own account. tons of hours of play and achievements and unlocks. You will need an xbox live account to play online and sign up for an EA account. It also has a mode to play by yourself offline and with a friend on a split screen. Recommended as an alternative to COD or battlefield for younger kids but great for any age especially if you love star wars.
customer_reviews.author: Jreynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Game arrived at the time it was supposed to. The game itself is a lot of fun. It's one of a few games my son and I can play together. So thankful for the bonding time. Would recommend the game.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: code missing
customer_reviews.text: bought this version for the extra stuff it claimed to have- but inside i guess it was supposed to include some xbox code to get the extras that was not there. Should have spent less and got the regular version- no difference without the code.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Good game for younger kids
customer_reviews.text: My sons love this game. This is a true battle game with many different ways to play for two. Battlefront does not have the blood and guts some games can have. It is an easy to get started game and easy for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Momwith2boys

customer_reviews.title: Used Game Without instructions
customer_reviews.text: Have not played it yet, did not come with the instruction book. Not a new game, obviously is a used disk, not shrink wrapped. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: joe zielbauer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely The Version To Get
customer_reviews.text: Good game, version comes with extra content (maps), needs a larger map overall and more variety. Number 2 is in the works, so hopefully it'll bring those changes.
customer_reviews.author: J. R.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good I must say I had my doubts but this is very fun and definitely keeps me entertained
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware - dlc maps were already used
customer_reviews.text: The basic game is decent but none of the dlcs were available due to the code already being used. So not quite sure if I got scammed or what. I bought the ultimate version to play all of the maps.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Great game. Love playing it with my kids
customer_reviews.text: Great game. Love playing it with my kids. An awesome first person shooter without a bunch of gore, so it is much more kid friendly than all the others... Really similar to battlefield, but friendlier.
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: Game sucked
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped for a good star wars game for a long time, guess I'll have to wait longer
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Visually amazing Star Wars game.
customer_reviews.text: Great online game and that’s about it, it’s meant for online and isn’t advertised as anything else so don’t expect a campaign, but there are missions.
customer_reviews.author: J. Alonso

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, I couldn't figure it out at first (how ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, I couldn't figure it out at first (how to play) but now I get it and it's alot of fun, highly reccomend buying this product if you're into Star Wars.
customer_reviews.author: Nick D Pajic

customer_reviews.title: Good game, but...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good game, but I hate that I found out the Season Pass that came with it was expired. Bummer, but still a fun game!
customer_reviews.author: Grayson S.

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if it was where I live or ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it was where I live or what but it would not load on my xbox. But higher review because they did take it back no questions asked
customer_reviews.author: Karli Rae Roadarmel

customer_reviews.title: Worth it in terms of graphics and nostalgia
customer_reviews.text: Good for its time, but not great when it comes to longevity as the limited options for gameplay and nauseating repetition become tiresome. Good graphics, very nostalgic, and overall a solid game despite its limitations.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C. Herring, MD

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: What I've been looking for since Dark Forces. I love the game play.
customer_reviews.author: R. C. Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Not all it was hyped up to be
customer_reviews.text: The game could use a solo story option. Not as fun as it was hyped up to be.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: it's fun, but I would prefer a straight shooter
customer_reviews.text: As a Star Wars fan, it's fun, but I would prefer a straight shooter, not a group game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for dads and sons who are big Star Wars fans!
customer_reviews.text: My boys (8 & 10) and I love this game. We have had so much fun playing it together.
customer_reviews.author: JONATHAN D HARRISON

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: bought it after seeing star wars rogue one. love it
customer_reviews.author: Manuel T.

customer_reviews.title: Great  Xbox game Star Wars Battlefront
customer_reviews.text: Star War Battlefront Ultimate Edition makes your grown children happy at Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: lefty

customer_reviews.title: Great Game for Price
customer_reviews.text: Great game, EA though. Should be able to do everything except online multiplayer without internet. But some limitations. Fun game though! Felt like I was in the movie.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Stroud

customer_reviews.title: Game is great but the Ultimate Edition was misrepresented
customer_reviews.text: The game is fun. Great graphics but was misrepresented. I bought the Ultimate Edition but the expansion packs are not unlocked which is why I paid more for it. That tidbit was not disclosed so I am not satisfied with the product purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun! The graphics are amazing
customer_reviews.text: Our family got this for Christmas. A lot of fun! The graphics are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: K&J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was so happy to receive this from his nana for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: FloridaGirl

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Sadly it did not work and we missed the window to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: He says it good.
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift to my son for X-mas. He says it good.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great game for Star Wars fans
customer_reviews.text: My husband and kids love this game. They think it is great. Any Star Wars fan will love this.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Greta Star Wars game
customer_reviews.text: Excellent game and great add-ons (includes Scarif) -but these are download only.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the kids for Christmas and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Very bad
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. I bought this knowing it was not like the older games but still came in too optimistic. Had low expectations and the game couldn't amount to so-so.
customer_reviews.author: T-Bird

customer_reviews.title: A favorite Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves it. A very exciting game. In fact he plays it with his Uncle, so it entertains two family members At once!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: If you love star wars and the battlefield games, then this game is made for you
customer_reviews.author: jonny

customer_reviews.title: Easily one of the best purchases I've made
customer_reviews.text: Easily one of the best purchases I've made, I'm a HUGE star wars fan and this makes all my childhood dreams come true.. SO much fun to play online..... Worth it
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Ward

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: You really need Xbox live to make this game worth it
customer_reviews.author: Alex Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it it's a very nice game for a Star Wars fan
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Graphics are amazing, it feels like Star Wars! It came with all the maps and extras.
customer_reviews.author: Dex

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying this game a lot
customer_reviews.text: I've enjoyed playing this game so much since I got it, that I wouldn't feel right giving it anything less than five stars. I played the old Battlefront games, but they were never as enjoyable as this one. My only real complaint is that you can't upgrade weapons like you can in similar games.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Valin

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this game for my 13 year old son ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this game for my 13 year old son. It has add ons that the original game did not have.He hasn't stopped playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: SweetDee

customer_reviews.title: It captures the Star Wars look and feel.
customer_reviews.text: Ok game. Presentation menus are generic. Graphics gorgeous. Feels Arcady. However, if you are a Star Wars fan, its a must play.
customer_reviews.author: Lancelotkrt

customer_reviews.title: FIVE STARS
customer_reviews.text: Fan of star wars film, books, comics, and video games. This games is awesome to play multiplayer online with others. I'll be getting sequel game to complete my star wars gaming collection.
customer_reviews.author: xArkSlade08x

customer_reviews.title: GAME ON
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of games, but bought this as a family gift and others love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tomboy70

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice game and great effects. A good game to play with a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun, easy to jump right in and play online.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Rex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: was given as a birthday gift---it was shipped fast and the person who received it was happy----thanks
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Sprouse

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: the load times for this game made it nearly unplayable
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great visually - Gameplay is pretty basic
customer_reviews.text: The graphics are amazing and this authentically feels like Star Wars. However, the lack of a single player mode as well as the very basic nature of this make it feel incomplete even with the entire DLC. I wish that they had applied more of what Battlefield 1 did instead of pushing it out before Star Wars: The Force Awakens came out. However, if you can get this marked down to 20-30 bucks like I did I would recommend it. Not something that I would advise purchasing at full price.
customer_reviews.author: MelanieTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome price, 29.99 includes all dlc, game is a lot of fun, reliving childhood fantasies
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing game play, great graphics. Just as described, great seller
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: My husband and daughters love the game
customer_reviews.text: My husband and daughters love the game. They're not huge gamers, but appreciate the graphics, the story and the fact it's Star Wars!!
customer_reviews.author: 4happycats

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love battlefront but I did on day shipping and it did not come.
customer_reviews.author: Mika Peck

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE CHILD ACCOUNT
customer_reviews.text: Making a child account restricts all online features including redemption code features. It's irreversible
customer_reviews.author: JM Here

customer_reviews.title: EA sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Got for son for Xmas... EA banned his account from accessing DLC due to his age. Once done, there is no way to undo it without sending a birth certificate to dobverifications@ea.com. Frustrating and lame. As a parent I should dictate what my kids can and can't watch or play... And furthermore, I can not return the product due to DLC codes which makes this product worth the $10 the base game was selling for Xmas and not the $40 I paid for the Ultimate Edition.
customer_reviews.author: Wagnbat

customer_reviews.title: I'd like a refund or the codes for downloading the content
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy ultimate edition. Doesn't include season pass or DLC that is promised in description. I'd like a refund or the codes for downloading the content.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Tschida

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully 2 will be good
customer_reviews.text: Poor game not really related to stars more of a bad call of duty
customer_reviews.author: Hino6170

customer_reviews.title: There's something wrong with the game. I installed the ...
customer_reviews.text: There's something wrong with the game. I installed the season pass with no problem. Unfortunately, once you get into the game, it doesn't allow you to select any of the season pass content. So buying this was pointless. I could've saved some money and just got the regular version.....pointless...and waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Jonah G.

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: This is false advertising for the used copies of the Ultimate Edition. Ultimate Edition comes with an active season pass, the season pass code that came with the game was already redeemed. When you select the used radial and the product description reads "The Star Wars Battlefront Ultimate Edition has everything fans need to live out their Star Wars battle fantasies, including Star Wars Battlefront and Star Wars Battlefront Season Pass. Rebels and Imperials alike will be able to expand their galaxy, with 4 epic expansion packs, including Star Wars Rogue One: Scarif. In addition, players can enjoy 30+ maps, 14 heroes and 14 game modes."
customer_reviews.author: Brian Herschbach

customer_reviews.title: Once downloaded graphics are good but hate the fact that you have to download ...
customer_reviews.text: Took about 10 hours to download before you can play. Can't just put the disc in and play. What's up with that. Once downloaded graphics are good but hate the fact that you have to download before playing and that it takes so long.
customer_reviews.author: badomingue

customer_reviews.title: No DLC in my game
customer_reviews.text: My game did not come with EA season pass that was supposed to come with game that includes all DLC content
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is ok, but seems a little clumsy maybe I shouldn't be playing battlefield 1 at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Badger

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy it used. I got duped, no updates or extra maps with my Ultimate Edition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of potential
customer_reviews.text: Lots of potential, but just misses a bit on a lot of things. The sound is good, the graphics are pretty, the missions are cool, but then actually playing is kind of flat somehow.
customer_reviews.author: AbqPhil

customer_reviews.title: PRE-ORDER DISASTER
customer_reviews.text: What type of game is released that is so messed up that you have to download a complete new version to even play it? THIS ONE!!! Disc as received had 19.2GB install on it BUT WONT PLAY. in order to play it needs a 22GB UPDATE THAT HAS TO BE DOWNLOADED BEFORE YOU CAN EVEN PLAY ANYTHING!
customer_reviews.author: Skb

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!!!  DO NOT BUY UNLESS YOU HAVE XBOX LIVE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game expecting to play the dlc and a did not realize I needed a subscription to xbox live. All I wanted to do was play the death star trench but apparently you have to be part of the online gaming community to do that. I'm not that in to gaming that i want to join xbox live. I feel swindled by EA.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Just buy Call of Duty.  At least you get a campaign-mode there.
customer_reviews.text: No true campaign mode. And for a game of any kind, the loading times on this game are beyond ridiculous. Who was asking for one of the greatest stories ever told on film to be made into a multiplayer Call of Duty game? Absolute rubbish.
customer_reviews.author: jmerc

customer_reviews.title: The language was horrible and the book was just plan nasty & evil
customer_reviews.text: I only kept reading this book because I wanted to know who the hired hand was and how he was connected. Otherwise I would have put this book down early on. The language was horrible and the book was just plan nasty & evil. Like others it gave me nightmares. I will not pass this book along but will throw it in the garbage can.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Eide

product_meta.title: Star Wars Battlefront Ultimate Edition - Xbox One
product_meta.description: Platform:Xbox OneThe Star Wars Battlefront Ultimate Edition has everything fans need to live out their Star Wars battle fantasies, including Star Wars Battlefront and Star Wars Battlefront Season Pass. Rebels and Imperials alike will be able to expand their galaxy, with 4 epic expansion packs, including Star Wars Rogue One: Scarif. In addition, players can enjoy 30+ maps, 14 heroes and 14 game modes.
feature_bullets: Discover characters, maps, and more from the movie, with Star Wars Rogue One: Scarif
That’s no moon! One of the deadliest weapons in the galaxy makes its debut, with Star Wars Battlefront Death Star
Join legendary smuggler Lando Calrissian and cold-blooded bounty hunter Dengar in Cloud City, with Star Wars Battlefront Bespin
Fight among the factories of Sullust and battle within Jabba the Hutt’s palace on Tatooine, with Star Wars Battlefront Outer Rim

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars297 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
